text: Hi Ryan, nice to meet you. Sorry in the delay in getting back to you, I have been on training at work so had the last 3 days away. How are you?

Marketing for me was never my first choice, I always wanted to be an architect, I got into marketing at college when I had a very encouraging teacher who gave me all the pros and cons and an insight into the industry
Marketing is a very broad subject but a subject that is so interesting and you probably talk marketing without realising it

Hi Graham I understand the delay. I am good just focusing on my coursework in college at the moment. I also had aspirations of being an architect funnily enough and I think Marketing would be a good opportunity for me to use the skills I have developed in Travel and Tourism but also my pasrents tell me all the time that I'm a good communicator so maybe sales could be my thing. What do you think?
Also what training have you been doing?

Ah cool, Iâ€™ve heard you would like to have your own business too? Good communication is key to most job roles but especially sales and marketing. How confident are you? Sales needs a confident, verging on cocky personality. I have been on a brands with business impact training, learning how to apply this to my brands to ensure I make the best out of them

Yeah I would like to mange my own business in the future but I'm not sure what kind of business it would be. I would say I am a good communicator and am confident when I speak. I would like to earn a good amount of money in the future so I am doing work experience whenever I get the chance and applying for local jobs.
